name: OMAC Advertising
description:
OMAC Advertising Agency began helping clients achieve their marketing goals in 1980. 
Since then, we have grown into a full-service consulting agency experienced in building the marketing foundation for multi-million dollar companies. 
At OMAC, we are not limited to a specific industry, but rather a unique philosophy: "Smart Marketing." 
We rely on our experience and expertise to accomplish your marketing goals. We focus on what you need and deliver it, on time and within budget.
